EmailTemplate.description: This is the default email invitation template for survey: FET 5.0 & 5.1 Enhancement and Training Survey

EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please complete this survey at:
{!IF(User.Id != null,IF(Case.Id != null,'https://freestyle--timbasurveys.na34.visual.force.com/apex/timbasurveys__survey?id=a1Y61000004nCiEEAU&uId=' + User.Id + '&case_id=' + Case.Id + '&wf=yes','https://freestyle--timbasurveys.na34.visual.force.com/apex/timbasurveys__survey?id=a1Y61000004nCiEEAU&uId=' + User.Id + '&wf=yes'),'')}
